name: Driftkhana
description:
Built with freedom in mind, there are no point systems, time limits, or rules simply because when it comes to cars and drifting, you should be free to do whatever you want!

We've put in loads of smoke, skidmarks and dynamic obstacles to ensure your drifkhana experience is as close to the real thing as possible.

Driftkhana lets you drift till your heart's content, interacting with a variety of objects within the set. Moveable ramps, giant road cones and beach balls are but a few of the fun props you'll find yourself skidding around.

MORE CARS COMING SOON!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sQ0gvFN_wFY

Key Features:
- World class physics
- Multiple control options
- Multiple camera views
- Dynamic props and obstacles
- Movable ramps
- Loads of smoke :)
